PostToolUse.description: Suggest creating a Trello card after significant code changes

hooks.prompt: I notice you've made code changes. Would you like me to create or update a Trello card to track this work?

PostToolUse.description: Suggest updating card after git commit

hooks.prompt: I see you've committed code. Should I update a Trello card with this progress or move it to the next list (e.g., In-Progress -> Done)?

PostToolUse.description: Suggest creating card after bug fix

hooks.prompt: It looks like you've fixed a bug. Would you like me to create a Trello card to document this fix, or update an existing one?

PreToolUse.description: Check for related Trello cards before starting work

hooks.prompt: Before making changes, would you like me to check Trello for any related cards or tasks?
